title: v.247 Hotfixes - December 18, 2023
content: Here you'll find a list of hotfixes that addresses a variety of bugs and issues reported within the v.247 New Age: Into The Abyss update.

title: Cash Shop Update for December 13
content: Violet Cube Daily Deal, Nutcracker Set, Match Girl Set, Permanent Holiday Rings, 90 Day Pets, and more!

title: [Updated December 13] v.247 - New Age: Into the Abyss Patch Notes
content: Click here to read the patch notes for v.247 - New Age: Into the Abyss.

title: [Completed] Unscheduled Cash Shop, Auction, and Monster Life Server Maintenance - December 12, 2023
content: The unscheduled Cash Shop, Auction, and Monster Life server maintenance has been completed. Thank you for your patience.

title: [Completed] Scheduled Game Update - December 13, 2023
content: We will be performing a scheduled game update on Wednesday, December 13, 2023 at 5:00 AM PST (8:00 AM EST / 2:00 PM CET / 12:00 AM AEDT Dec. 14).
